description:
The course is aimed at SMEs (small and medium sized enterprises), with the sole intention of enabling business professionals to produce their own print material

The focus of learning is shifted from general usage, to a very specific set of requirements

All lectures use and promote; ONLY the tools that are necessary for serving the course’s goals

The Instructor has selected several executions that are common in business, which includes the creation of; Business Cards, to Flyers, To Brochures etc

The course ends with a live scenario, and uses some useful design practices that will help make your company’s brand memorable and noticeable

By the time it’s all over, our Students will be confident in the methods required to execute an idea and ultimately see it through to physical form

Aspects learned in this course are inclusive of, but not limited to:

  • Gaining fundamental working knowledge of PaintShop Pro.
  • Setting up and executing a print job.
  • Evolving corporate material, from concepts to finished pieces.
  • Applying basic design theory to print projects.
title: Creating Print Materials with PaintShop Pro
